name: Ece
description:
Will you be able to rescue your tribe and free the spirit animal Thaka? Prologue

This is our village, our tribal members have always been living here in peace with each other and nature, forevermore under the protection of our mighty spirits. 

On the day of the sun festival we beseeched one of them, THAKA, to protect our home. No one was aware of what the hostile KENAI-tribe had planned. 

The chaos ensued across our village, they destroyed it completely and tamed THAKA with magical forces. They abducted him and laid our home in ashes. 

Our brothers and sisters barely succeeded in escaping. But due to the lack of the totem animal’s protective ban no one has ever dared to return to this village, yet.
